youtube.title: What Happens When an Injection Misses the Vein? | Medical Animation
youtube.description: Explore the biology behind a missed injection. This animation shows how blood escapes the vessel to form a hematoma when a needle is inserted incorrectly. Perfect for students and curious minds! Subscribe for more medical insights.
